paragraph.keyLead:
2. Leaves distributed at the base of the branches; lower portion of petiole and margin of leaflets setulose; stem and branches usually brown, yellowish or yellowish-green ...................................................................................................................... 6.
Ch. megacycla

- Leaves regularly distributed along the branches; lower portion of petiole and margin of leaflets glabrous; stem usually greenvinaceous or reddish...........................................................................................................................................................................3
